name: Doomed Pets
description:
Doomed Pets is a Run n' Gun style platformer game where you rescue animals and use them in ways to proceed through levels. The way you use them is not always in their best interest... also your name may or may not be Dave

This game has 4 levels and 1 boss fight. There are cutscenes after each level and boss fight.

Made for GDevelop Game Jam #2 :D

Liluo: https://liluo.io/wingdinghq/doomed-pets

For some reason, in Liluo the resolution is all wrong. So its better if you play it from here I guess.

Please give feedback in the comments :)
